EmailTemplate.name: send an email to the Lead Creator when the Opportunity is closed.
EmailTemplate.subject: Opportunity is Closed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
This notice is to inform you that Opportunity {!Opportunity.Opportunity_Number__c} {!Opportunity.Name} has been closed {!Opportunity.StageName}. This opportunity was created based on a lead {!Opportunity.Lead_Number__c} that you initiated.
Thank you.
